command.text:
&Tiny.External.Import.Command;
declare @xSplit bit, @compactMode char(1) &ControlLocationLotLoading; set @xSplit = 1 end if exists(select 1 from options where name = 'm_compact_mode' and val = '1') select @compactMode = '1' else select @compactMode = '0' &ExportImportTemplateQuery; if isnull(@xSplit, 0) <> 1 if @compactMode = 1 select '1' as view_index&ExportImportTemplateQueryReturnFileName; else select '0' as view_index&ExportImportTemplateQueryReturnFileName; else begin if @xSplit = 1 begin select case when @$location = 0 and @$Lot = 0 then 1 when @$location = 1 and @$Lot = 0 then 2 when @$location = 0 and @$Lot = 1 then 3 when @$location = 1 and @$Lot = 1 then 0 end as view_index&ExportImportTemplateQueryReturnFileName; end end

text.v: Hóa đơn điều chỉnh giá hàng bán

processing.text: &CheckVoucherRightBeforeProcess; declare @q nvarchar(4000), @duplicate nvarchar(512), @locked nvarchar(512), @field varchar(32), @wsID varchar(8), @voucherID varchar(8) declare @master varchar(16), @detail varchar(16), @inquiry varchar(16), @general varchar(16), @baseCurrency varchar(8), @datetime0 char(21), @d0 datetime declare @user int, @admin bit, @r int, @m int, @y int, @max1 int, @max2 int, @count int, @roundPrice int, @roundAmount int, @roundFAmount int select @d0 = getdate(), @datetime0 = convert(char(8), @d0, 112) + ' ' + convert(char(12), @d0, 114), @status = left(replace(@status, '''', '') , 1) select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @master = 'm&Detail;$', @detail = 'd&Detail;$', @inquiry = 'i&Detail;$', @general = 'c&Detail;$000000', @voucherID = '&Code;' select @locked = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đã khóa số liệu, kiểm tra lại ngày chứng từ tại dòng %s.' else N'Data is locked, please check the date of voucher at row %s.' end select @duplicate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Chứng từ số %s1 ngày %s2 tại dòng %s3 đã tồn tại.' else 'The voucher number %s1 dated %s2 at row %s3 already exists.' end select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ws_id' select @baseCurrency = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' select @roundPrice = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_gia' select @roundAmount = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_tien' select @roundFAmount = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_tien_nt' select @max1 = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = @master + '000000' and column_name = 'so_ct' select @max2 = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = @detail + '000000' and column_name = 'so_lsx' -- Checking update @@table set so_ct = space(@max1 - len(rtrim(ltrim(so_ct)))) + rtrim(ltrim(so_ct)) &ImportOverwriteData; if @check$Unit <> '1' begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', stt, 'C001' from @@table a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(replace(@duplicate, '%s1', so_ct), '%s2', convert(varchar(12), cast(ngay_ct as smalldatetime), 103)), '%s3', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end end end -- Update update @@table set so_lsx = space(@max2 - len(ltrim(rtrim(so_lsx)))) + ltrim(rtrim(so_lsx)), dvt = case when a.dvt <> '' then a.dvt else b.dvt end, &UnitUpload.General; ma_nt = case when a.ma_nt <> '' then a.ma_nt else @baseCurrency end, tk = case when a.tk <> '' then a.tk else c.tk end, tk_du = case when a.tk_du <> '' then a.tk_du else case when e.loai_ct = '1' then b.tk_gghb else b.tk_dt end end, tk_thue = case when a.tk_thue <> '' then a.tk_thue else case when e.loai_ct = '1' then rtrim(d.tk_thue_no) else rtrim(d.tk_thue_co) end end, ma_tt = case when a.ma_tt <> '' then a.ma_tt else c.ma_tt end from @@table a left join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt left join dmkh c on a.ma_kh = c.ma_kh left join dmthue d on a.ma_thue = d.ma_thue left join dmmagd e on a.ma_gd = e.ma_gd select top 0 ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct, user_id0 as id into #unit from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #unit select b.ma_dvcs, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, min(a.stt) from @@table a join dmkho b on a.ma_kho = b.ma_kho group by b.ma_dvcs, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct -- Checking if @check$Unit = '1' begin if @$mode = 1 begin select b.ma_dvcs, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.stt as id into #unitmode from @@table a join dmkho b on a.ma_kho = b.ma_kho &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', id, 'C002' from #unitmode a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(id) from #unit a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(replace(replace(@duplicate$Unit, '%s1', so_ct), '%s2', convert(varchar(12), cast(ngay_ct as smalldatetime), 103)), '%s3', rtrim(ma_dvcs)), '%s4', @@delta + @r) as message from #unit where id = @r return end end end -- Locked Date &ImportLockedDateCheck; @@checking(1); if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'dvt', stt, '00001' from @@table a left join vdmvtqddvt b on a.dvt = b.dvt and (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt and a.dvt = c.dvt where b.dvt is null and c.dvt is null &w1;'dvt'&w2;stt&w3;'00001'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'dvt', @r = min(stt) from @@table a left join vdmvtqddvt b on a.dvt = b.dvt and (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt and a.dvt = c.dvt where b.dvt is null and c.dvt is null&Error; end if @admin <> 1 begin select @field = 'ma_kho' &SiteRight; end &ConfigDynamicImportChecking; &ImportOverwriteChecking;&EndErrorMode; -- Gather select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #id(stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, stt) select '', a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, min(a.stt) from @@table a&ImportOverwriteIdentiyDataCondition; group by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct select identity(int, 1, 1) as id, cast(stt as int) as stt, convert(varchar(8), ngay_ct, 112) + so_ct as c, cast(0 as int) as ln into #ln from @@table order by ngay_ct, so_ct, stt exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateLineNumber create index i on #ln(stt) select @count = count(*) from #id exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateIdentityNumber @wsID, @voucherID, @count, @@userID &ImportOverwriteProcess; -- select top 0 a.stt_rec, a.stt_rec0, a.line_nbr, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.ma_vt, a.ma_kho, a.ma_vi_tri, a.ma_lo, a.dvt, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so, a.so_luong, a.gia_nt2, a.gia2, a.tien_nt2, a.tien2, a.thue_nt, a.thue, a.tk_vt, a.tk_du, a.ma_vv, a.ma_bp, a.so_lsx, a.ma_sp, a.ma_hd, a.ma_phi, a.ma_ku &DetailTaxDetailStructure;&VoucherGoodsTypeImportFieldDetail; into #d&Detail; from d&Detail;$000000 a, dmvt b insert into #d&Detail; select b.stt_rec, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Voucher$GetRecordsGroup(i.ln), i.ln, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.ma_vt, a.ma_kho, a.ma_vi_tri, a.ma_lo, a.dvt, c.nhieu_dvt, 1, a.so_luong, a.gia_nt2, round(a.gia_nt2 * a.ty_gia, @roundPrice), a.tien_nt2, round(a.tien_nt2 * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), round(a.tien_nt2 * (d.thue_suat / 100), case when a.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then @roundAmount else @roundFAmount end), round(a.tien_nt2 * a.ty_gia * (d.thue_suat / 100), @roundAmount), c.tk_vt, a.tk_du, a.ma_vv, a.ma_bp, a.so_lsx, a.ma_sp, a.ma_hd, a.ma_phi, a.ma_ku &DetailTaxDetailValue;&VoucherGoodsTypeImportFieldDetailInsert; from @@table a join #id b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt left join dmthue d on a.ma_thue = d.ma_thue join #ln i on a.stt = i.stt order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.stt update #d&Detail; set he_so = b.he_so from #d&Detail; a join vdmvtqddvt b on (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') and a.dvt = b.dvt where a.nhieu_dvt = 1 &VoucherGoodsTypeImportDetailUpdate; -- select top 0 stt_rec, status, ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct, loai_ct, so_seri, tk, tk_thue, ma_thue, ma_kh, ma_gd, ma_kh2, ong_ba, ma_tt, dien_giai, ma_nt, ty_gia, t_thue_nt, t_thue, t_tien_nt2, t_tien2&VoucherGoodsTypeImportFieldMaster; into #m&Detail; from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #m&Detail; select b.stt_rec, @status, c.ma_dvcs, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, e.loai_ct, a.so_seri, a.tk, a.tk_thue, a.ma_thue, a.ma_kh, a.ma_gd, a.ma_kh2, '', a.ma_tt, a.dien_giai, a.ma_nt, a.ty_gia, d.t_thue_nt, d.t_thue, d.t_tien_nt2, d.t_tien2&VoucherGoodsTypeImportFieldMasterInsert; from @@table a join #id b on a.stt = b.stt join #unit c on a.ngay_ct = c.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = c.so_ct &VoucherGoodsTypeImportMasterJoin;join (select stt_rec, sum(thue_nt) as t_thue_nt, sum(thue) as t_thue, sum(tien_nt2) as t_tien_nt2, sum(tien2) as t_tien2 from #d&Detail;&VoucherGoodsTypeImportMasterWhere; group by stt_rec) d on b.stt_rec = d.stt_rec join (select ma_gd, min(loai_ct) as loai_ct from dmmagd where ma_ct = @voucherID group by ma_gd) e on a.ma_gd = e.ma_gd &VoucherGoodsTypeImportMasterUpdate; &DetailTaxUpdateMasterValue; -- select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, status, user_id0, c$, m$, d$, e$, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #i&Detail; from i&Detail;$000000 insert into #i&Detail; select stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, @status, @user, convert(varchar(12), ngay_ct, 112) + so_ct + stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(ma_gd) + '#15$' + rtrim(loai_ct) + '#20$' + rtrim(ma_kh) + '#30$' + rtrim(tk) + '#40$' + rtrim(ma_nt), '', '' from #m&Detail; select @q = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry('#i&Detail;', '#d&Detail;', 'd$', 'ma_kho, ma_vt, tk_du', '#10$, #20$, #30$', 'stt_rec', default, default, 'HD4', 'e$', 1) exec sp_executesql @q -- Insert declare @p varchar(32), @masterTable varchar(32), @detailTable varchar(32), @inquiryTable varchar(32), @insKey varchar(128), @insertKey varchar(128) select distinct month(ngay_ct) as m, year(ngay_ct) as y into #k from #id select @r = min(y * 12 + m) from #k while @r is not null begin select @m = m, @y = y from #k where y * 12 + m = @r select @p = rtrim(@y) + replace(str(@m, 2), ' ', '0'), @insKey = 'month(%a.ngay_ct) = ' + rtrim(@m) + ' and year(%a.ngay_ct) = ' + rtrim(@y) select @masterTable = @master + @p, @detailTable = @detail + @p, @inquiryTable = @inquiry + @p, @insertKey = replace(@insKey, '%a.', '') select @q = @@inserting(master, @masterTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q select @q = @@inserting(detail, @detailTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q &DetailTaxAfterInsertDetail; select @q = @@inserting(inquiry, @inquiryTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q &EIImportInsert; &ImportOverwriteInsertingByPart; select @r = min(y * 12 + m) from #k where y * 12 + m > @r end @@inserting(general); &ImportOverwriteInserting; insert into ctgt21 (stt_rec, ngay_ct, ngay_lct, ten_kh, dia_chi, ma_so_thue) select a.stt_rec, a.ngay_ct, a.ngay_ct, b.ten_kh, b.dia_chi, b.ma_so_thue from #m&Detail; a join dmkh b on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh declare @External nvarchar(4000), @Statement nvarchar(4000), @Numeric varchar(4000), @String varchar(4000), @fieldSelect varchar(4000) if @status <> '0' begin &VoucherGoodsTypeImportPost; select stt_rec, ma_vt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #tmp from #d&Detail; group by stt_rec, ma_vt order by stt_rec, sum(tien_nt2) desc select stt_rec, min(id) as id into #g from #tmp group by stt_rec delete #tmp from #tmp a where not exists (select 1 from #g b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.id = b.id) select a.*, c.ten_vt into #detailpost from #d&Detail; a join #tmp b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec join dmvt c on b.ma_vt = c.ma_vt where a.line_nbr = 1 -- Inventory select @Statement = 'update #in set datetime0 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', datetime2 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', user_id0 = ' + rtrim(@user) + ', user_id2 = ' + rtrim(@user) + ', sl_xuat1 = 0, sl_xuat = 0' select @Statement = @Statement + char(13) + 'update #in set ma_nx = b.ma_nx from #in a join dmnx b on a.ma_nx = b.tk where b.ma_nx is not null' exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$PostInventory '#m&Detail;', '#d&Detail;', @voucherID, '#k', 'pn_gia_tb, ct_dc, sl_xuat1, sl_xuat, gia_nt01, gia01, gia_nt0, gia0, tien_nt0, tien0, cp_vc_nt, cp_vc, cp_bh_nt, cp_bh, cp_khac_nt, cp_khac, cp_nt, cp, cp_thue_yn, ck_nt, ck, nam, ky, sl_td1, sl_td2, sl_td3, s4, s5, s6 &DetailTaxPostInventoryUpdateZero;', 'ma_nk, so_seri, so_lo, ma_khon, ma_vi_trin, so_dh2, so_dh3, ma_nvbh, ma_nv, tk_gv, tk_thue_co, tk_ck, stt_rec_pn, stt_rec0pn, stt_rec_px, stt_rec0px, stt_rec_dc, so_seri0, ma_td1, ma_td2, ma_td3, gc_td1, gc_td2, gc_td3, s1, s2, s3', 'tk_du = c.tk, ma_nx = c.tk, tk_dt = b.tk_du, px_gia_dd = 1, gia_nt1 = 0, gia_nt21 = 0, gia1 = 0, gia21 = 0, tien_nhap = 0, tien_nt_n = 0, tien_xuat = 0, tien_nt_x = 0, tien_nt2 = case when c.loai_ct = ''1'' then -b.tien_nt2 else b.tien_nt2 end, tien2 = case when c.loai_ct = ''1'' then -b.tien2 else b.tien2 end, thue_nt = case when c.loai_ct = ''1'' then -b.thue_nt else b.thue_nt end, thue = case when c.loai_ct = ''1'' then -b.thue else b.thue end, ngay_lct = c.ngay_ct, tk_thue_no = c.tk &DetailTaxPostInventoryUpdateField;', @Statement, 0, 2, 0 -- Tax select @External = '&DetailTaxPostTaxExternal;, line_nbr = 1, status = ''' + @status + ''',ma_ct = ''' + @voucherID + ''', ngay_lct = b.ngay_ct, datetime0 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', datetime2 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', user_id0 = ' + rtrim(@user) + ', user_id2 = ' + rtrim(@user) select @Statement = '', @Numeric = 'nam, ky, sl_td1, sl_td2, sl_td3, s4, s5, s6', @String = 'ghi_chu, ma_nvbh, ma_nk, ma_mau_ct, ma_td1, ma_td2, ma_td3, gc_td1, gc_td2, gc_td3, s1, s2, s3' &DetailTaxPostTax; &VoucherGoodsTypeImportPostTax; exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$PostTax '#m&Detail;', &DetailTaxPostTaxTable;, '#k', @Numeric, @String, @External, @Statement, '1' -- cttt50 select *, t_tien_nt2 + t_thue_nt as t_tt_nt, t_tien2 + t_thue as t_tt, @voucherID as ma_ct, @datetime0 as datetime0, @datetime0 as datetime2, @user as user_id0, @user as user_id2 into #malloc from #m&Detail; where loai_ct = '1' select *, tien_nt2 + thue_nt as tt_nt, tien2 + thue as tt into #dalloc from #d&Detail; exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$Allocation @voucherID, '0', '#malloc', '#dalloc', 't_tt_nt', 't_tt', 'tt_nt', 'tt', 'cttt50', '', '' -- Payment delete #detailpost from #detailpost a join #m&Detail; b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and b.loai_ct <> '2' select @External = 'status = ''' + @status + ''', ma_ct = ''' + @voucherID + ''', ngay_ct0 = b.ngay_ct, dien_giai = c.dien_giai, t_tt_nt = c.t_tien_nt2 + c.t_thue_nt, t_tt = c.t_tien2 + c.t_thue, t_tien_nt2 = c.t_tien_nt2, t_tien2 = c.t_tien2, datetime0 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', datetime2 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', user_id0 = ' + rtrim(@user) + ', user_id2 = ' + rtrim(@user) select @Statement = '', @Numeric = 'tt, tt_nt, sl_td1, sl_td2, sl_td3, s4, s5, s6', @String = 'ma_td1, ma_td2, ma_td3, gc_td1, gc_td2, gc_td3, s1, s2, s3' exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$PostPayment '#m&Detail;', '#detailpost', 'tk', @Numeric, @String, @External, @Statement, '0', '1', '0' end if @status = '1' begin select @fieldSelect = 'stt_rec, ma_dvcs, ''' + @voucherID + ''', ngay_ct, so_ct, t_tien_nt2 + t_thue_nt, t_tien2 + t_thue, ma_nt, ty_gia, dien_giai, ''' + @datetime0 + ''', ' + rtrim(@user) exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$PostLater '#m&Detail;', @voucherID, @fieldSelect, '' end if @status = '2' begin declare @glGroup varchar(128), @glAcctField varchar(128), @glAcctFieldRef varchar(128), @glAmountField varchar(128), @glFCAmountField varchar(128), @glKey varchar(512), @glNoAccList varchar(128), @glNoAccListRef varchar(128) if exists(select 1 from options where name = 'm_post_hh_hddt' and val = '1') begin select @glAcctField = 'tk,tk_du,tk_thue_no', @glAcctFieldRef = 'tk_du,tk,tk_thue', @glAmountField = 'tien2,tien2,thue', @glFCAmountField = 'tien_nt2,tien_nt2,thue_nt', @glKey = 'loai<>''90'',loai=''90'',thue_nt + thue <> 0', @glNoAccList = '1,1,1', @glNoAccListRef = '0,0,0' exec sp_executesql N'update #d&Detail; set tien_nt2 = -tien_nt2, tien2 = -tien2 where loai = ''90''' end else begin select @glAcctField = 'tk,tk_thue_no', @glAcctFieldRef = 'tk_du,tk_thue', @glAmountField = 'tien2,thue', @glFCAmountField = 'tien_nt2,thue_nt', @glKey = '1=1,thue_nt + thue <> 0', @glNoAccList = '1,1', @glNoAccListRef = '0,0' end select @Numeric = 'ct_nxt, nam, ky, gt_dd, gt_co, gt_no, sl_td1, sl_td2, sl_td3, s4, s5, s6', @String = 'so_ctgs, so_ct0, ma_nk, so_lo, head_item, so_dh, gc_td1, gc_td2, gc_td3, s1, s2, s3', @External = 'ong_ba = b.ong_ba, ma_gd = b.ma_gd, dien_giai_h = b.dien_giai, datetime0 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', datetime2 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', user_id0 = ' + rtrim(@user) + ', user_id2 = ' + rtrim(@user), @Statement = '' select @glGroup = groupby from @@sysDatabaseName..voucherinfo where ma_ct = @voucherID &DetailTaxPostGL; select a.*, b.tk, b.tk as tk_thue_no &DetailTaxPostGLTaxAccount;, b.ma_dvcs, b.ma_kh, b.ma_kh as ma_kh_ref, @voucherID as ma_ct, b.loai_ct, b.ngay_ct as ngay_lct, b.ma_nt, b.ty_gia, 0*tien2 as tien, 0*tien_nt2 as tien_nt, b.dien_giai as dien_giai, b.dien_giai as dien_giai_h into #dGL from #d&Detail; a join #m&Detail; b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec where b.loai_ct = '2' exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$PostGL '#m&Detail;', '#dGL', @voucherID, @glAcctField, @glAcctFieldRef, @glAmountField, @glFCAmountField, @glKey, @glNoAccList, @glNoAccListRef, @glGroup, @Numeric, @String, @External, @Statement, '#k' -- loai_ct = 1 select @glAcctField = 'tk_du,tk,tk_thue', @glAcctFieldRef = 'tk,tk_du,tk_thue_no' truncate table #dGL insert into #dGL select a.*, b.tk, b.tk as tk_thue_no &DetailTaxPostGLTaxAccount;, b.ma_dvcs, b.ma_kh, b.ma_kh as ma_kh_ref, @voucherID as ma_ct, b.loai_ct, b.ngay_ct as ngay_lct, b.ma_nt, b.ty_gia, 0*tien2 as tien, 0*tien_nt2 as tien_nt, b.dien_giai as dien_giai, b.dien_giai as dien_giai_h from #d&Detail; a join #m&Detail; b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec where b.loai_ct = '1' exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$PostGL '#m&Detail;', '#dGL', @voucherID, @glAcctField, @glAcctFieldRef, @glAmountField, @glFCAmountField, @glKey, @glNoAccList, @glNoAccListRef, @glGroup, @Numeric, @String, @External, @Statement, '#k' end
